settings.title: Non-GMO Soda | Benefits of Non-GMO Soda - Non-GMO Alcoholic Drinks
settings.subtitle: Interested in a healthy non-gmo alternative to soda? We discuss what non-gmo is, what non-gmo soda is, the benefits of non-gmo soda, and non-gmo alcoholic drinks.

settings.title: Non-GMO Soda
settings.desc:
Have you ever seen "Non-GMO" on a food label and wondered what it meant? Non-GMO means that the food does not contain genetically modified organisms. GMOs refer to plants or animals which have been modified in ways that do not occur naturally.

In food and beverage, when a label displays "Non-GMO" this means that the particular food or beverage item does not contain any ingredients which have been modified.

Now, let's further discuss what non-GMO sodas are and why Perfy soda is the perfect Non-GMO soda.

settings.title: What is Perfy Non-GMO Soda?
settings.desc:
Perfy Non-GMO soda is a delicious alternative to traditional sodas and Perfy does not contain ANY GMOs. Perfy is made with all-natural ingredients including natural sweeteners like stevia, allulose, and monk fruit, as well as 100% real fruit juice.

Perfy tastes like the sodas you are familiar with but offers a healthy alternative with additional benefits like a boost in cognition and mood while mitigating stress and anxiety.

settings.title: The Benefits of Drinking Perfy Non-GMO Soda
settings.subtitle:
When it comes to drinking a non-GMO soda, it really is a no-brainer. But speaking of the brain, Perfy contains L-theanine, ashwagandha, and turmeric to help with cognition and mood while reducing stress and anxiety.

In addition, Perfy offers a variety of benefits including:
settings.desc:
Less sugar than traditional sodas.

Keto-friendly!

Fewer calories. This can be helpful for those trying to lose weight or maintain a healthy weight.

No artificial ingredients.

Caffeine-free, so you can enjoy it any time of day.

Gluten-free, allowing those following a gluten-free diet to enjoy a refreshing soda.

Vegan, making it a great choice for those following a vegan lifestyle.

settings.title: Non-GMO Alcoholic Drink Recipes
settings.desc:
If you're looking for a way to enjoy alcoholic beverages without GMOs, consider mixing a Perfy soda with liquor. From whiskey to gin, tequila, mezcal, or rum, there are many ways to enjoy an alcoholic beverage while keeping away from GMOs.
